description: This file defines a Flutter widget class 'BaseScaffold' implementing a responsive layout scaffold with a top bar, side navigation for wide screens, and bottom navigation for narrow screens. It manages navigation and UI components for a fitness management app.

classes.name: BaseScaffold
classes.description: A responsive scaffold widget that provides a consistent layout with a top app bar, side navigation for wide screens, and bottom navigation for narrow screens.

classes.name: _TopBar
classes.description: A widget representing the top app bar with notification status and user menu.

classes.name: _SideNav
classes.description: A widget rendering a vertical list of navigation items for large screens.

classes.name: _BottomNav
classes.description: A widget rendering a bottom navigation bar for small screens.

classes.name: _NavItem
classes.description: A data class representing a navigation item with a label, icon, and path.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for BaseScaffold, including responsiveness handling.

methods.name: _navItems
methods.description: Returns the list of navigation items.
